name: Pixbee
description:
Welcome to Pixbee!

Pixbee is the first game developed by Randoraz, from Solanum Team. It's a game based on the classic Tamagotchi. You have to take care of your Pixbee to make him grow!

MENU instructions:

  • Mouse, arrow keys/WASD and ENTER to navigate the menu.
  • ESC to pause during the game.  

IN GAME Instructions:

  • SELECT (left button): Z button. Use it to select an action.
  • EXECUTE (middle button): X button. Use it to execute an action.
  • CANCEL / GO BACK (right button): C button.

NOTE: Saving is not available for web. Download the game to create a save file.

Programming, art and music by Randoraz.
